task_descriptions: You need a ride from '`Location-1@ride`' to '`Location-2@ride`' to get to your `ImportantMeeting@generic`. Your name is `CustomerName-1@ride`.
linear_guide: You really need to be there soon. If the car takes more than `DurationMinutes@ride` minutes to pick you up, ask for a different one.
Say something about your `ImportantMeeting@generic`. Be creative!
If your ride is a `ServiceProvider@ride`, make sure your driver is not `DriverName@ride`.

You realize that you are actually closer to `Location-3@ride` right now. If you haven't booked yet, change your departure location to there. Otherwise, say something about the service provider of your ride.
Once you have found a ride that suits you, book it and talk some more about your `ImportantMeeting@generic` or make a joke. Then end the conversation.

Wizard.task_description: Help the user book a ride.
